survey_name: Professional Development Needs for Remote Software Engineers Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the professional development needs and preferences of remote software engineers to help organizations tailor their learning and growth programs effectively.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current professional development opportunities provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure options are balanced and unambiguous.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current professional development opportunities provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following professional development areas are most important to you? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture prioritized areas. Include an 'Other' option for unlisted preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following professional development areas are most important to you? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What is your preferred format for professional development activities?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice to identify the most preferred format. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.

script.question_text: What is your preferred format for professional development activities?

questions.question_text: What barriers do you face in accessing professional development opportunities?
answer_options: Lack of time due to work commitments
Time zone differences for live sessions
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice to identify common barriers. Include an 'Other' option for unlisted challenges.

script.question_text: What barriers do you face in accessing professional development opportunities?
answer_options: Lack of time due to work commitments
Time zone differences for live sessions

questions.question_text: Please describe any additional professional development needs or suggestions you have for your employer.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters for readability.

script.question_text: Please describe any additional professional development needs or suggestions you have for your employer.
